name: Gravity Simulation
description:
• R to restart
  • Escape to quit
  • M to go to the main menu
  • Move the mouse to move the camera

Little simulation about the gravity.

The planets increase its mass by colliding with others, this can happen randomly, everytime or never depending on what you choose in the main menu.
